Mistborn Mistborn are enigmatic individuals, commanding awe and fear. Their unique ability to burn all Allomantic metals grants them a wide range of potent abilities. By ingesting these metals, they can boost their strength, traverse battlefields, sway emotions, and manipulate time. Metal Reserve(s) Mistborn ingest metals from vials to sustain their Allomantic abilities. Metal Reserves are replenished after a short or long rest. Metal Reserves You gain 4 Metal Reserves.

Mistborn burn these reserves to activate their Allomantic abilities. Your metal reserve capacity increases at each level until level 13, and then every two levels thereafter. You gain an additional Metal Reserve to fuel your Allomantic abilities. Enables the ability to push on metallic objects. As you prepare to burn steel, all creatures bearing metal will be highlighted, making them clear targets for your Allomantic abilities. Enables the ability to greatly enhance your physical strength, endurance, and resilience. Enables the ability to heighten all five senses for greater perception and awareness. Enables the ability to inflame and manipulate the emotions of others. Enables the ability to soothe and dampen the emotions of others. Enables the ability to drains all magic from a target upon contact. Take [3] less damage from Piercing, Slashing, and Bludgeoning damage. Each hit sustained while burning pewter will deal [4] damage after you stop burning pewter. You can fully focus on a creature possessing the ability to cast spells, preventing it from becoming Hidden or Invisible while its magic can be detected. Burn bronze to detect the presence of aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends and undead in the area, preventing them from Hiding or becoming Invisible. Bendalloy Bubble Burn bendalloy to create a time bubble that speeds up time and applies Haste to all creatures inside the bubble. Any creatures that leave the bubble must pass a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become Lethargic. The bubble's surface blocks direct attacks from passing in or out. Bendalloy Bubble (End) Stop maintaining the bendalloy bubble. Bendalloy Haste Creature has a +2 bonus to Armour Class, Advantage on Dexterity Saving Throws, its movement speed is doubled, and it can take one additional action per turn.

If the creature leaves the bendalloy bubble while it is being maintained, the creature becomes Lethargic. Bendalloy Bubble (Flare) Lethargy Immunity You are immune to Lethargy this turn. Ending the bubble manually or running out of Metal Reserves on your turn will not cause Lethargy to affect creatures inside the bubble. However, if your concentration is broken for any other reason, all creatures within the bubble must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become Lethargic. Cadmium Bubble Burn cadmium to create a time bubble that slows down time and applies Slow to all creatures inside the bubble. Any creatures that leave the bubble must pass a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become Lethargic. The bubble's surface blocks direct attacks from passing in or out. Cadmium Bubble (Flare) Cadmium Bubble (End) Stop maintaining the cadmium bubble. Cadmium Slow Creature's movement speed is halved, and its Armour Class and Dexterity Saving Throws are reduced by 2. The creature can't take reactions or make more than 1 attack per turn, and can only take either an action or a bonus action. Spells cast might be delayed for 1 turn.

If the creature leaves the cadmium bubble while it is being maintained, the creature becomes Lethargic. Burn aluminum to immediately remove all your Metal Reserves. This also removes any magical curses affecting you. Aluminum Purge Chromium Negate Burn chromium to touch a nearby creature and try to stop the spell being cast. Stop a spell from being cast. Chromium Leach (Enhance) Chromium Leach (Flare) Spell Block The lingering effects of Chromium prevent the target from casting spells. Duralumin Burn Duralumin alongside another metal, amplify the effects of that metal to achieve powerful feats of Allomancy. In exchange, all reserves of the chosen metal are consumed, rendering you unable to use that metal until your next long rest. All Duralumin-Enhanced abilities have a +2 to DC. Duralumin-Enhanced Iron Pull By burning iron with duralumin, dramatically increase the power of your pull, drawing all enemies in range [1] towards you. Duralumin-Enhanced Steel Shove By burning steel with duralumin, dramatically increase the power of your shove, pushing all enemies in range [1] away from you. Duralumin-Enhanced Coin Shot By burning steel with duralumin, dramatically increase the power of your coin shot, propelling metal coins towards up to [1] target(s). Duralumin-Enhanced Pewter By burning pewter with duralumin, dramatically enhance your physical abilities for one turn. You gain an additional action and Pewterarm.

Additionally, gain Advantage to Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws and attack rolls.

Heal for [1] and become immune to Piercing, Slashing, and Bludgeoning damage. Duralumin-Enhanced Soothe Emotions By burning brass with duralumin, dramatically enhance your ability to soothe emotions. All enemies in range become pacified and emotionless by you and unable to take hostile actions. Emotionless Affected entity is stripped of all emotions and can't move or take actions. Attack Rolls against it have Advantage, while its Attack Rolls and Dexterity Saving Throws have Disadvantage. Duralumin-Enhanced Riot Emotions By burning zinc with duralumin, dramatically enhance your ability to riot emotions. All enemies in range become overwhelmed with fear and flee from you. Duralumin-Enhanced Chromium Leach By burning chromium with duralumin, dramatically enhance your leeching power. Drain all spell slots from the target upon contact. Iron Drained Unable to burn [1], preventing the use of all associated Allomantic abilities. Steel Drained Pewter Drained Brass Drained Zinc Drained Chromium Drained Duralumin-Enhanced Cadmium Bubble Cadmium Drained By burning cadmium with duralumin, dramatically decrease the speed of time in your time bubble. Create a cadmium bubble that lasts 3 turns. All creatures inside the bubbles are affected by Time Stop. The bubble's surface blocks direct attacks from passing in or out. Time Stop Flow of time has stopped for you. Duralumin-Enhanced Bendalloy Bubble Bendalloy Drained Time Rush Flow of time has stopped for those around you. By burning bendalloy with duralumin, dramatically increase the speed of time in your time bubble. Create a bendalloy bubble that lasts 3 turns. All creatures outside the bubbles are affected by Time Stop. The bubble's surface blocks direct attacks from passing in or out. Battle Allomancer Battle Allomancers excel in blending weapon attacks with Allomantic abilities to control the battlefield. They support allies by pulling or pushing enemies, using crowd control to manipulate positioning and protect their team. With enhanced strength, agility, and resilience, they can take heavy damage while dishing out powerful strikes, seamlessly weaving Allomantic power and martial prowess together for maximum impact in combat. Mental Allomancer Mental Allomancers specialize in emotion manipulation, charming foes or spreading fear to control the flow of battle. They excel at bolstering their allies' abilities while weakening their enemies' resolve. Their mastery of emotions makes them a powerful force in both combat and negotiation. Temporal Allomancer Temporal Allomancers manipulate the flow of time, altering the pace of battle to their advantage. They can slow enemies or hasten allies, creating strategic openings and controlling the battlefield. Their mastery over time gives them unmatched flexibility in combat. Enhancement Allomancer Enhancement Allomancers amplify their own and others' Allomantic abilities, dramatically boosting power for short bursts. They can turn the tide of battle with overwhelming strength or drain their foes' magic. Their ability to enhance or suppress powers makes them a versatile and dangerous ally or enemy. Allomantic Awakening After a life-changing event awakens the dormant Allomantic abilities within you, you gain the power to burn metals and unleash their unique effects.

You learn to burn a new metal at each level until level 12, and then every two levels thereafter. For some allomantic abilities, you can burn additional metal reserves to produce an enhanced effect. When you fall, you can use your reaction and a metal reserve to gain Resistance to Falling damage. Metal Flaring Gain the ability to flare metals, burning them at an accelerated rate to enhance their effects. Allomantic Reflexes Your growing mastery of allomantic abilities enables you to swiftly respond to threats. When an enemy moves within [1] of you, you can use your reaction to activate the base effect of a metal you know, expending twice the usual amount of metal reserves. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you finish a short or long rest. Caster You gain [1] additional Metal Reserves to fuel your allomantic abilities. Backup Reserves You’ve learned to keep an emergency supply of metals for critical moments in battle. You prepare a vial filled with extra solution, which you can swiftly consume as a bonus action to restore 4 Metal Reserves. Quick Allomancy Can use an extra non-Duralumin allomantic ability without expending an action or bonus action. Your mastery of allomantic abilities allows you to act with exceptional speed. Once per short or long rest, you can use an extra non-Duralumin allomantic ability without expending an action or bonus action. Atium Burning atium grants you the ability to see a few seconds into the future, manifesting as shadows that show where your enemies will move or attack. For the next 3 turns, you gain +3 AC, advantage on all attack rolls and saving throws, and enemies have disadvantage when attacking you. Gain +3 AC, advantage on all attack rolls and saving throws, and enemies have disadvantage when attacking you Savant Through prolonged and intense use of a single metal, you have become a savant. Choose one metal you know; when burning this metal, you gain heightened power and control over its effects, with the potential for special interactions. Iron Savant Your mastery over iron allows you to bypass typical limitations.

You can now pull regardless of metal, size, or weight restrictions.

Any damage dealt by iron is increased by an additional die.

Iron Redirection no longer requires a reaction point to redirect attacks away from allies.

You no longer take fall damage. Steel Savant Your advanced understanding of steel enhances your ability to push metal.

You can now push regardless of metal, size, or weight restrictions.

Any damage dealt by steel is increased by an additional die.

Steel Jump is now permanent.

You no longer take fall damage. Tin Savant As a Tin Savant, you can no longer stop burning tin without great harm.

Your senses are permanently heightened, granting you the benefits of Tineye at all times.

You are also immune to Surprised.

You will still be Stunned for 2 rounds when Blinded. Pewter Savant As a Pewter Savant, your body has adapted to the strain of burning pewter.

You no longer take damage after ending Pewter Enhance.

You gain the benefits of Pewter Arm permanently.

You also begin each combat with temporary hit points. Zinc Savant As a Zinc Savant, your ability to riot emotions becomes more intense and dangerous.

Your zinc-based abilities now deal [1] per metal reserve used.

Abilities that frighten now cause enemies to become overwhelmed with fear, making them flee from your presence. Brass Savant As a Brass Savant, your mastery over soothing emotions becomes overwhelming.

Your brass-based abilities now deal [1] per metal reserve used.

Abilities that charm now induce a state of emotionless compliance, rendering enemies cold and unfeeling. Bronze Savant Gain Detect Magic, Detect Evil and Good, and Sense Invisibility. As a Bronze Savant, your heightened sensitivity to pulses permanently grants you the abilities to Detect Magic, Detect Evil and Good, and Sense Invisibility.

Your attunement to Allomantic vibrations and magical energy allows you to uncover hidden forces and threats effortlessly. Copper Savant As a Copper Savant, you generate a permanent coppercloud aura, granting you and nearby allies nondetection and copper guard. Aluminum Savant As an Aluminum Savant, your connection to aluminum allows you to passively repel harmful magical effects.

You instantly negate any charm, petrify, stun, and curse. Chromium Savant Your mastery of Chromium allows you to completely disrupt enemy spellcasters and leaves lingering effects.

Your chromium-based abilities can now block targets from casting any spells for 1 turn they fail a second Wisdom saving throw. Duralumin Savant As a Duralumin Savant, you gain precise control over how much metal you burn when using duralumin. After burning a metal with duralumin, you are no longer locked out from using that metal and can continue to burn it normally. Nicrosil Savant Your mastery over Nicrosil allows you to infuse a target regardless of how long ago they last used their magic, allowing you to boost their magic without time constraints. Bendalloy Savant As a Bendalloy Savant, you can now move with your Bendalloy bubble, carrying the compressed time field with you as you act, allowing you to manipulate time on the go. This does not apply to bubbles created with duralumin. Additionally, your movement while moving with the bubble is reduced. Cadmium Savant As a Cadmium Savant, you can now move with your Cadmium bubble, carrying the compressed time field with you as you act, allowing you to manipulate time on the go. This does not apply to bubbles created with duralumin. Your mastery of electrum grants you unparalleled foresight.

You gain permanent immunity to opportunity attacks, allowing you to move freely through the battlefield as you anticipate your enemies' every strike. Electrum Savant Gold Savant As a gold savant, you have mastered the art of slipping into your alternate selves.

You no longer suffer mental strain when using gold.

You can now adopt the talents of your alternate shadows that specialized in different skills. You gain permanent proficiency in all skills associated with that ability. One with Preservation You have reached the pinnacle of Allomantic power, becoming one with the very essence of Preservation. Once per long rest, you can merge with Preservation itself, regenerating all your Metal Reserves instantly. For the next 3 turns, you gain an additional action and bypass all resistances and immunities. Metal Deflection As an expert in burning iron and steel, you subtly manipulate nearby metal, allowing you to deflect blows and evade attacks with precision. After activating an iron or steel ability, gain +[1] Armour Class for 1 turn. Armour Class increase by [1]. Martial Knowledge As someone who is well studied in warfare and combat, you have Proficiency in History. Adaptive Maneuvers When you perform a weapon attack with your action, you can use your bonus action to activate the effect of a physical metal at the base level. Alternatively, when you perform any physical allomancy with your action, you can use your bonus action to perform a weapon attack. Coin shot is considered a weapon attack for this feature. You can use your bonus action to activate the effect of a physical metal at the base level. Allomantic Strikes (Piercing) After using an iron or steel ability, your next weapon attack consumes a Metal Reserve to deal additional [1] damage based on your Wisdom Modifier. Coin shot is considered a weapon attack for this feature. Allomantic Strikes (Bludgeoning) Allomantic Strikes (Slashing) Your next weapon attack consumes a Metal Reserve and does additional [1] damage based on your Wisdom Modifier. Metallic Synergy Metallic Synergy When you use physical allomancy on a target, the target has Disadvantage on your weapon attacks against them. Affected entity has Disadvantage against attack rolls made by the applier. You have Advantage on attack rolls against a target you've used physical allomancy against. Debilitating Influence Enemies affected by your Mental Allomancy abilities find their focus on you disrupted. When influenced by your debuffs, they have disadvantage on attack rolls against you for two turns. Affected entity has Disadvantage on attack rolls against the applier. Master Manipulator You gain Proficiency in either Persuasion or Deception. Spreading Hysteria Once per turn, when you successfully inflict a charm or fear effect on an enemy with Brass or Zinc, the hysteria spreads. The nearest enemy within 10m must pass a Wisdom saving throw or become affected by the same condition. Mass Hysteria Your Allomantic influence now reaches even further. Once per turn, when you successfully inflict a charm or fear effect on an enemy, up to three nearest enemies within 10m must pass a Wisdom saving throw or suffer the same condition. Mental Reinforcement When an ally is afflicted with fear or charm, you use your mental allomancy to reinforce their minds, granting a +[1] bonus to all saving throws for the duration of the effect. This bonus is also conferred when you bolster your allies with your mental allomancy. You have +[1] to all Saving Throws. Chronostamina As a master of manipulating time bubbles, you seamlessly adjust to rapid shifts in time. You are immune to the effects of Lethargy from spells like Haste, as well as the effects of Slow and Time Stop spells, and from moving out of time bubbles. The effect of a cadmium bubble still affects you.

Additionally, you have advantage for maintaining concentration while in a time bubble. Masks of Gold You have mastered the use of Gold Shadows, enabling you to exploit their potential with greater ease. As an action, summon a Gold Shadow that only you can see and that cannot interact with anything. As a bonus action, you can merge into the shadow, taking the shadow's position and destroying it in the process.

Requires learning Gold to use. Burn gold to summon a Gold Shadow that can not interact with anything and is visible only to you. Like other gold abilities, this process is mentally taxing and you will take [1] damage. You may choose to merge with the shadow and take its position whenever you want, destroying the shadow in the process. Gold Shadow Merge Merge with your Gold Shadow and take its position. This process will destroy the shadow. Like other gold abilities, this process is mentally taxing and you will take [1] damage. Efficient Bubbles You have become highly efficient in manipulating Cadmium and Bendalloy time bubbles. Maintaining these bubbles now costs only 1 Metal Reserve per turn instead of 2. Temporal Potency Your time bubbles have become significantly more potent. Bendalloy bubbles now grant an additional action per turn and an additional 2 AC. Cadmium bubbles reduce AC and Dexterity saving throws by an additional 2 and quarter movement speed instead of halving it. Combat Enhancement You learn to combine your weapon attacks and enhancement allomancy. When you successfully hit with a melee weapon attack, you may activate the effect of Chromium Leach or Nicrosil Infuse on the creature you hit. Aluminum Specialist You learn other ways to utilize the nullifying effects of aluminum. Once per long rest, you can choose to augment an ally's helmet, body armor, or weapon with aluminum for different effects.

Require learning Aluminum to use. Aluminum Armor Utilize the nullifying effects of aluminum by integrating it on an ally's armor, allowing them to nullify a spell targeting you. If the spell is higher than your proficiency bonus, you must make a check using your spellcasting ability to prevent it.
